String.string: (Guild) Order to Subjugate the Change Forest
Thank you for your hard work.
Token of Subjugating the Change Forest
Kill {@Creature:47#2001#argonomorph caprin imps}, {@Creature:47#2002#argonomorph faeries}, and {@Creature:47#2003#argonomorph gulas} around the {@Rgn:47003$$Bridgehead} and collect tokens.
Report to Laetesha at Pathfinder Post when mission is complete.
